titles.title: A concurrent resolution correcting the enrollment of S.J.Res. 317.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/27/1988--Introduced. Makes corrections in the enrollment of S.J. Res. 317 (commemorating the bicentennial of the French Revolution).
